code: import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import gsap from'gsap-trial';import DrawSVGPlugin from'gsap-trial/DrawSVGPlugin';import MyPhoto from'../../../assets/images/my-photo.png';import'./index.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Logo=function Logo(){var bgRef=useRef();var outlineLogoRef=useRef();var solidLogoRef=useRef();useEffect(function(){gsap.registerPlugin(DrawSVGPlugin);gsap.timeline().to(bgRef.current,{duration:1,opacity:1}).from(outlineLogoRef.current,{drawSVG:0,duration:20});gsap.fromTo(solidLogoRef.current,{opacity:0},{opacity:1,delay:1,duration:4});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-container",ref:bgRef,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"solid-logo",ref:solidLogoRef,src:MyPhoto,alt:"JavaScript,  Developer"})});};export default Logo;
